sourcesContent:
import './SelectedMovie.css' function SelectedMovie(props) { const { movie, onBack } = props; const genres = movie.genres.split('').join(', ') return (

{movie.title}

⭐️ {movie.average_rating.toFixed(2)}

Released: {movie.release_date}

Genres: {movie.genres}

Overview: {movie.overview}

Movie Length: {movie.runtime}

Go Back!
); } export default SelectedMovie
